articles.author: F1
articles.title: Verstappen storms to victory in action-packed season-opening Bahrain GP - Formula 1
articles.description: Max Verstappen converted pole position into the race win with a controlled drive in Saturday night’s Bahrain Grand Prix, leading home Red Bull team mate Sergio Perez and Ferrari rival Carlos Sainz to start his latest title defence in perfect fashion.
